## Overview

::: {layout-ncol=2}

This tutorial introduces the command-line interface (CLI). You'll learn how to open a terminal on macOS/Linux or Windows, run basic commands, and create, move, and delete files and directories.

![](images/terminal-logo.png){width=50%}
:::


**Prerequisites:** None
